title: Behind The Idea #64: Talking Boeing's 737 MAX 8 Issues W/Madhu Unnikrishnan
description: Boeing continues to grab headlines as the hows and whys of the recent Ethiopian Air crash are dissected by various authorities. Madhu Unnikrishnan, editor of Skift Airline Weekly, joins Mike Taylor and shares his views on the development of the 737 MAX 8, what is reasonable to expect from the review process, and how big of an impact these events might have on the company.
itunes:title: Talking Boeing's 737 MAX 8 Issues W/Madhu Unnikrishnan
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Skift Airline Weekly's Madhu Unnikrishnan explains the background and likely outcomes of the current 737 MAX 8 problems.
